nodes.short_description: You are Consortium Bishop Six, a celebrity peacekeeper in the year 2042. Speak out loud using your own voice to shape relationships and navigate choices. Experience a VR murder mystery thriller aboard a futuristic aircraft with a unique narrative twist. Every choice counts.

Vous êtes l'Évêque Six du Consortium, un célèbre pacificateur en l'an 2042. Parlez à haute voix avec votre propre voix pour façonner les relations et naviguer dans les choix. Vivez un thriller de mystère et de meurtre en réalité virtuelle à bord d'un avion futuriste avec un rebondissement narratif unique. Chaque choix compte.

Sie sind Bischof Sechs des Konsortiums, ein berühmter Friedenswächter im Jahr 2042. Sprechen Sie laut mit Ihrer eigenen Stimme, um Beziehungen zu gestalten und Entscheidungen zu treffen. Erleben Sie einen VR-Mordkrimi an Bord eines futuristischen Flugzeugs mit einer einzigartigen erzählerischen Wendung. Jede Entscheidung zählt.

Eres el Obispo Seis del Consorcio, un famoso pacificador en el año 2042. Habla en voz alta usando tu propia voz para moldear relaciones y tomar decisiones. Experimenta un thriller de misterio y asesinato en realidad virtual a bordo de una aeronave futurista con un giro narrativo único. Cada decisión cuenta.

nodes.long_description:
CONSORTIUM VR is both a complete Unreal Engine remaster of Game One of the iDGi-1 Trilogy (CONSORTIUM 2014) and a full adaptation of the work to what we’re calling VR Interactive Cinema. 

Use our interdimensional satellite, iDGi-1, to inhabit the mind of a newly commissioned officer of the Consortium: an unparalleled peacekeeping force tasked with maintaining global unity while protecting the Earth's environment.

-Introducing V.O.I.C.E: You may use your own voice to engage with a diverse cast of over 20 characters. Navigate a nuanced murder mystery with some potential action that makes up a deeply interactive, 6-10 hour campaign of Game One of the iDGi-1 Trilogy.

-Freely explore the Consortium Command vessel C-3800-D ZENLIL. Decide to embrace diplomacy and navigate the narrative without ever even raising a weapon, or choose more violent approaches and utilize assault weapons to kill or incapacitate your enemies. Choose to talk to everyone or choose to be a person of few words. 

-Immerse yourself into a deeply realized alternate, bright future world where many of humanity's problems have been solved. Access an in-world Information Console containing over a hundred articles of history, back-story and world events. 

-Control an array of weapons, protective gear, medical equipment and more entirely via interactive screens that line your virtual arms.
nodes.short_description: Become Consortium Bishop Six, a global peacekeeper in the year 2042. Introducing V.O.I.C.E.: speak and form relationships with the entire crew of Zenlil using your own voice. Experience VR Interactive Cinema - take an active role in a murder mystery, on a plane, in the future. Every choice counts.

nodes.change_log:
"CONSORTIUM VR V1.1.1

IMPROVEMENTS:

-Polishing pass of interface and HUD - corrected a number of fonts and colors to better pair with the HUD font/color paradigm established in Consortium: THE TOWER.
-Updated the Info Console - accuracy improvements and other minor fixes, now in sync with stand-alone Info Console program.

FIXES:

-Fixed rare/edge case non-progression that would occur upon loading a saved game made during Knight 15’s opening speech just before she hands over the CMC - in this one case, her hand would be empty.  (fixes the one and only case where an ISS has started but was paused so will play again (K15 group 80) but had the flag HasPlayed already set so would not fire the started logic again which caused the CMC to be missing from K15s hand)."

CONSORTIUM VR v1.1.0

You can now play chess against the Zenlil A.I in the lounge…can you beat the machine?

This feature is very likely to be the final “cherry on top” for this production.  

THANK-YOU SO MUCH to everyone who has helped us track down and fix the lingering issues that we missed leading up to the release. 

IMPROVEMENTS:

-The chessboard in the Zenlil lounge can now be used to play chess against A.I.
-Added social links to front end

FIXES:

-Fixed cases of the players orientation getting broken after being in the med bed causing movement to become very strange and broken
-Meta Quest: Fixed glaring performance issues in the VT missile defense (turned off sky material in C3800 for mobile for time being)
-Fixed other languages displaying the correct string for "lights!"
-Fixed cases of sounds fading out while saving a game playing again when loading that game and getting stuck on (med bed loop for example)
-Fixed the room system not being cleared when going into dream 2 (fixes the sky erroneously displaying)
-Fixed low quality clouds showing up in limbo / C3800 VT

CONSORTIUM VR v1.0.7

FIXES:

-Fixed non-progression bug that could happen with the controls for leaving the Bishop’s bed after dismissing pawn64 because you told him the truth about wade listening in. Now properly allows the player to get out of bed at the right time, if they choose to (for meeting with K15 or use the VT), and will carry onto the dream if they stay in bed.
-Fixed non-progression bug that could happen after the Pawn 64 "incident" if you told R25 about the traitor organically (as opposed to her asking you...). Now correctly forces the player to meet with K15
-Fixed issue where if the Pawn 64 incident occured *and* the player has not yet told R25 who they think the trator is, the timing of meeting up with K15 at her office was screwed up.
-Fixed timing with K15 showing up to open her office if the Pawn 64 incident did not occur, preventing an unnecessarily long wait for her to show up
-Fixed erroneous long "pause" that was in the pawn64 "incident" just after it started.
-Fixed erroneous early failing of objective that gives the player choice of VT, bed or meeting K15.
-Fixed turning on/off bishop cabin lights not making the lights on/off sound in the last half of the stream
-Changed using bishop's bed ISS prompt to be simply "lights!" so that it works as a toggle

"CONSORTIUM VR V1.0.6

FIXES:

-Fixed issue where the "use virtual trainer or sleep in your bed" objective could clear too early, making it unclear to some players how to progress (and was mistaken for a "soft-lock" at least once).
-Fixed issue where washroom light glitches would not be active in the last half of the stream."

"CONSORTIUM VR V1.0.5

Addressed most Meta Quest performance issues.

Fixed crash when loading saved game that could occur. 

FIXES:

-Fix for loading game crash which occured in a recent report. The exact cause is still unknown, but fixes and mitigations have been added.
-Improved end stream text lines for Kiril incapacitated when gassed"
